core.tut.pori.dao

Class SQLUpdateBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.dao.SQLUpdateBuilder

  • public class SQLUpdateBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class, which can be used to build an SQL UPDATE clause.
